title: Notification Subscription
description: Adobe Campaign notification subscriptions allow end-users opt into topics that can be used for communication such as marketing subscription lists.

xdm:topicID.title: Topic Identifier
xdm:topicID.description: The topic that the end-user has subscribed to and opted into notifications for.

xdm:subscriptionDate.title: Subscription Date
xdm:subscriptionDate.description: Date and time when the end-user has subscribed to a notification topic. An end-user is subscribed if they have a Subscription Date and the `unsubscriptiondetails/unsubscriptionDate` is empty.

xdm:notificationTarget.title: Target/destination for the notification
xdm:notificationTarget.description: Target/destination for where to send/receive the notification.

xdm:unsubscriptionDetails.xdm:remarkText: Sorry, leave me alone. These are my personal comments
